upcoming.title: Bluegrass Night
upcoming.description: Join us for an evening of traditional bluegrass music featuring The Mountain String Band. Enjoy great food, drinks, and live music under the stars.

upcoming.title: Acoustic Sunday
upcoming.description: Relax with acoustic guitar and vocals by local favorite Sarah Chen. Perfect afternoon entertainment for the whole family.

upcoming.title: Country Night
upcoming.description: Celebrate Valentine's Day with classic and modern country music from Dusty Roads Band.

upcoming.title: Mountain Jazz
upcoming.description: Smooth jazz in the mountains. The Laguna Jazz Trio brings their sophisticated sound to The Outpost.
